amendment.description: Amendment modernizes and streamlines the procurement procedures of the Department of Defense and the civilian agencies. \ As amended by the Collins (IL) amendment (A005), language was added which replaces current language on competitive bidding that requires "full and open" competition for Federal contracts with language requiring "maximum practicable competition."
amendment.purpose: An amendment to modernize and streamline Armed Forces acquisition and procurement policies.

action.text: Clinger amendment (A004) modified by unanimous consent. Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 164, the Clinger amendment was modified.
On agreeing to the Clinger amendment (A004) as modified and amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 1 (Roll no. 372).
